content.text: I'm looking forward to meeting new people and having deep conversations. What about you?
I am happy to meet new people and I love having meaningful conversations.
That's great! I'm a bit sad because my best friend moved away.
That's tough, I'm sorry to hear that. I know the feeling. My best friend moved away too.
Yeah, it's hard to say goodbye. I just hope they're happy.
I think it's important to focus on the good times you had together and the memories you made.
That's a good point. I have a lot of good memories with my best friend.
That's great! I'm sure they'll cherish those memories as well.
Of course! I'm happy to talk.
